flawed_nl_solution:
Single layer cake slices cost $4 x 7 = $<<4*7=28>>28.
Double layer cake slices cost $7 x 5 = $<<7*5=35>>35.
All the cake slices together cost $28 + $35 = $<<28+35=60>>60.
He will receive change of $100 - $60 = $<<100-60=40>>40.
#### 40

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 63, not 60. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
